Title: Coronavirus Treatment: HIV Drug Used To Cure COVID-19 Positive British National In India – Moose Gazette - Moose Gazette
Scientists identify 69 drugs which may be effective in fighting coronavirus - Oneindia
Description: According to the researchers, some of the medications are already used to treat diseases such as diabetes and hypertension, and repurposing them to treat Covid-19 may be faster than trying to invent a new vaccine.
